scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.build:contract: cd contract && npm run build && cp ./build/release/greeter.wasm ../out/main.wasm
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.test: npm run build:contract && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: cd contract && npm i && npm run test
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:ts && npm run test:integration:rs
